message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. It's a steal considering its true value to me! I'm confident you'll see the value in this opportunity. What do you say?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $950,000. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more.  $850,000 is simply too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $900,000? This is still a fantastic deal for you, considering the value to me. Let's make this happen!

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll offer $875,000 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
